TEXT.TITLE: JAPAN BUYS 8,000 TONNES OF CANADIAN RAPESEED
TEXT.BODY: Japanese crushers bought 8,000 tonnes of Canadian rapeseed for shipment from the last-half of July to September, trade sources said. Price details were not available. Reuter
